ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.subtitle: Ethical, supportive, and personalized fertility journeys for every family.
ourMission.visionSubtitle: What drives our work today and shapes tomorrow
ourMission.missionText: At Miracle Makers, we believe every family deserves the opportunity to experience the joy of parenthood. Our mission is to provide compassionate, ethical, and personalized surrogacy and egg donation services that transform dreams into reality.
ourMission.vision1Text: Making surrogacy and fertility services accessible to families worldwide, regardless of their location or circumstances.
ourMission.vision2Text: Leading the industry with cutting-edge technology, medical expertise, and compassionate care standards.
ourMission.vision3Text: Building a supportive global community that celebrates diversity and empowers families on their journey.
ourMission.commitmentSubtitle: The principles that guide every decision we make and every family we serve.
ourMission.commitment1Text: Every family receives personalized attention, emotional support, and care that goes beyond medical procedures.
ourMission.commitment2Text: We maintain the highest ethical standards in all our practices, ensuring transparency and trust.
ourMission.commitment3Text: From initial consultation to post-birth care, we're committed to supporting families throughout their entire journey.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.subtitle: A dedicated team committed to making dreams come true
whoWeAre.storyText: Founded with a vision to help families achieve their dreams of parenthood, Miracle Makers has grown from a small local practice to a globally recognized surrogacy and egg donation center. Our journey began with a simple belief: every family deserves the opportunity to experience the joy of parenthood, regardless of their circumstances. Today, we continue to uphold this belief through our comprehensive services, expert team, and unwavering commitment to ethical practices.
whoWeAre.value1Desc: Our experienced professionals are passionate about helping families grow.
whoWeAre.value2Desc: We serve families from around the world with local expertise.
whoWeAre.value3Desc: Every family receives personalized attention and support.
whoWeAre.value4Desc: Years of successful outcomes and satisfied families.
whoWeAre.value5Desc: Your privacy and security are our top priorities throughout the journey.
whoWeAre.value6Desc: We work as partners with you, ensuring transparency and open communication.

whyChooseUs.reasonsDesc: Discover why families choose us for their journey.
whyChooseUs.reason1Desc: Over 1000 successful pregnancies and growing families.
whyChooseUs.reason2Desc: Board-certified specialists with decades of experience.
whyChooseUs.reason3Desc: From initial consultation to post-birth support.
whyChooseUs.reason4Desc: Every journey is unique, every plan is customized.
whyChooseUs.reason5Desc: Access to the best medical facilities worldwide.
whyChooseUs.reason6Desc: Round-the-clock care and assistance when you need it.
whyChooseUs.comparisonDesc: See how we compare to other agencies.
whyChooseUs.testimonial1Text: Miracle Makers made our dream of parenthood a reality. Their expertise and compassion were unmatched.
whyChooseUs.testimonial2Text: The team at Miracle Makers supported us every step of the way. We couldn't have asked for better care.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our programs and support
faq.a1: We provide comprehensive surrogacy and egg donation programs with legal, medical, and 24/7 support.
faq.q2: Do you work with international families?
faq.a2: Yes. We support families worldwide with travel, accommodation, translation, and local coordination.
faq.a3: Contact us for a free initial consultation. We'll review your goals and create a personalized plan.
faq.a4: We offer surrogacy with own gametes, surrogacy with egg donor, egg freezing/preservation, and VIP concierge services.
faq.q5: How do I choose the right program?
faq.a5: During a free consultation, we assess your goals, timeline, and medical profile to recommend the best-fit program.
faq.a6: Costs vary by program and location. We provide a transparent, itemized budget and fixed-fee options where possible.
faq.q7: What legal protections are in place?
faq.a7: We coordinate with licensed attorneys to secure parentage and agreements that comply with local laws and your home country.
faq.a8: All parties complete medical, genetic (as needed), and psychological screenings to ensure safety and success.
faq.a9: At accredited partner clinics. The exact location depends on your program, legal requirements, and preferences.
faq.q10: How long does the process take?
faq.a10: Most journeys take 6-12 months from consultation to birth, depending on matching, legal steps, and medical factors.
faq.q11: Can I travel during the process?
faq.a11: Yes. Some appointments require in-person visits. We handle travel, lodging, and on‑the‑ground support.
faq.q12: What support do you provide during pregnancy?
faq.a12: A dedicated coordinator, 24/7 assistance, appointment management, and regular medical updates throughout.
faq.a13: Yes. We help with legal paperwork, travel documents, newborn logistics, and pediatric referrals.
faq.noResults: No results. Try a different search.

surrogacyProcess.subtitle: A comprehensive guide to your surrogacy journey
surrogacyProcess.step1Description: Begin your journey with a comprehensive consultation to understand your options and create a personalized plan.
surrogacyProcess.step2Description: Complete thorough legal and medical screening to ensure the best possible outcome for all parties.
surrogacyProcess.step3Description: We carefully match you with the perfect surrogate and coordinate all medical procedures.
surrogacyProcess.step4Description: Support throughout pregnancy and birth, ensuring a smooth transition to parenthood.
surrogacyProcess.timeline1Text: Initial consultation, legal preparation, and personalized planning for your surrogacy journey.
surrogacyProcess.timeline2Text: Complete medical and legal screening, then carefully match with your ideal surrogate.
surrogacyProcess.timeline3Text: Embryo transfer, pregnancy monitoring, and preparation for the arrival of your baby.
surrogacyProcess.support1Text: Direct access to our team via phone for immediate assistance and guidance.
surrogacyProcess.support2Text: Comprehensive email support for detailed questions and documentation.
surrogacyProcess.support3Text: Your dedicated coordinator provides personalized support throughout the entire process.

surrogacyWithOwnGametes.title: Surrogacy with Own Gametes
surrogacyWithOwnGametes.description: For couples who wish to maintain a biological connection with their child, surrogacy with own gametes offers the most natural path to parenthood. In this program, the intended mother's eggs and the intended father's sperm are used to create embryos through IVF, which are then transferred to a carefully screened surrogate.

ivfProcess.title: IVF Process
ivfProcess.step1: The IVF process begins with ovarian stimulation, egg retrieval, fertilization, and embryo culture in the lab. Fertilization can be done using conventional IVF or ICSI depending on sperm quality.
ivfProcess.step2: The process is carefully monitored to optimize egg quality and embryo development. Lab specialists assess embryos over several days to select the ones with the highest chance of implantation.
ivfProcess.step3: Each step is customized based on the medical profile of the intended parents, ensuring the approach is tailored to their specific needs and fertility factors.

embryoTransfer.title: Embryo Transfer
embryoTransfer.step1: After fertilization, the healthiest embryos are selected for transfer to the surrogate's uterus. Timing and preparation of the surrogate are carefully managed to maximize implantation success.
embryoTransfer.step2: The surrogate is monitored closely before, during, and after the transfer. Hormonal support and lifestyle guidance are provided to create the best environment for the embryo to thrive.
embryoTransfer.step3: Each step is customized based on the medical profile of the intended parents, ensuring the approach is tailored to their specific needs and fertility factors.

eggFreezing.title: Egg Freezing / Preservation
eggFreezing.description: Egg freezing, also known as oocyte cryopreservation, is a process that allows women to preserve their fertility by freezing their eggs for future use. This advanced reproductive technology offers women the opportunity to delay childbearing while maintaining the quality of their eggs.

process.title: The Egg Freezing Process
process.step1: The process begins with ovarian stimulation using fertility medications to encourage the development of multiple eggs. This is carefully monitored through blood tests and ultrasounds to ensure optimal egg development.
process.step2: Once the eggs reach maturity, they are retrieved through a minor surgical procedure called egg retrieval. The procedure is performed under sedation and typically takes 15-20 minutes.
process.step3: The retrieved eggs are immediately frozen using a process called vitrification, which preserves them at extremely low temperatures. This advanced freezing technique maintains egg quality and viability for future use.

benefits.title: Benefits of Egg Freezing
benefits.step1: Preserve fertility for women who want to delay childbearing due to career, education, or personal reasons. This is especially valuable for women in their late 20s to early 30s.
benefits.step2: Maintain egg quality by freezing eggs when they are at their peak fertility. This can be particularly beneficial for women facing medical treatments that may affect fertility.
benefits.step3: Provide peace of mind and reproductive options for the future. Frozen eggs can be stored for many years and used when the time is right for starting a family.

surrogacyWithEggDonor.title: Surrogacy with Egg Donor
surrogacyWithEggDonor.description: For intended parents who need donor eggs, our surrogacy with egg donor program provides a comprehensive solution. This program combines the expertise of carefully screened egg donors with our experienced surrogates to help you build your family.

process.title: The Process
process.step1: We carefully match you with a qualified egg donor who meets your specific criteria. Our donors undergo thorough medical, psychological, and genetic screening to ensure the highest quality standards.
process.step2: The selected egg donor undergoes ovarian stimulation and egg retrieval. The eggs are then fertilized with the intended father's sperm or donor sperm through IVF procedures.
process.step3: The resulting embryos are transferred to a carefully matched surrogate who carries the pregnancy to term. Throughout the process, we provide comprehensive support and monitoring for all parties involved.

benefits.title: Benefits of This Program
benefits.step1: Access to a diverse pool of carefully screened egg donors with detailed profiles including medical history, education, and personal characteristics.
benefits.step2: Comprehensive support throughout the entire process, from donor selection to birth, ensuring a smooth and successful journey to parenthood.
benefits.step3: High success rates with our experienced medical team and proven protocols, giving you the best chance of achieving a successful pregnancy and healthy baby.

vipConciergeServices.title: VIP Concierge Services
vipConciergeServices.description: Our VIP Concierge Services provide comprehensive support for international intended parents, offering housing, translation, transportation, and personalized assistance throughout your surrogacy journey. We ensure your comfort and peace of mind during this important time.

services.title: Our VIP Services
services.step1: Premium housing accommodations in comfortable, fully-furnished apartments or hotels near medical facilities. We arrange everything from booking to check-in, ensuring your stay is comfortable and convenient.
services.step2: Professional translation services for all medical appointments, legal meetings, and important communications. Our certified translators ensure clear communication throughout your journey.
services.step3: Comprehensive transportation services including airport transfers, medical appointment transportation, and local travel assistance. We provide reliable, comfortable transportation for all your needs.

benefits.title: Why Choose VIP Services
benefits.step1: Seamless experience with all logistics handled by our experienced team, allowing you to focus on your journey to parenthood without worrying about practical details.
benefits.step2: Cultural and language support to help you navigate the local environment comfortably, with assistance available 24/7 for any questions or concerns.
benefits.step3: Peace of mind knowing that every aspect of your stay is professionally managed, from accommodation to transportation, ensuring a stress-free experience during this important time.

testimonials.title: What Families Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from families who achieved their dreams with us.

review1.name: Salome G.
review1.text: This is the best company in Georgia! With a highly qualified team. The founders and employees of the company are very attentive. Professionals of their case and most importantly create all kinds of comfort for patients.

review2.name: Sara M.
review2.text: We're thrilled with the arrival of our little ones thanks to this great agency that helps and supports us every step of the way. We're a great family and can't wait to return to Tbilisi.

review3.name: Miguel Angel G.
review3.text: A fantastic experience with Natia, Nini, and their entire team. Throughout such a complex process, they always showed us impeccable security and assurance. Our first stay there was a luxury, with every possible detail.

review4.name: Eka A.
review4.text: This is a company that gives happiness to families, colors the lives of couples with the brightest colors! A team of the best specialists! Thank you for making people happy all over the world!

review5.name: Teo P.
review5.text: Professionals from head to toe! After searching and looking extensively, we decided to put ourselves in their hands, and we weren't wrong. We're already enjoying our angel, for which I will be grateful for life.

review6.name: Keti B.
review6.text: The best one! Super and professional team! Highly recommended!
